sense.name: endorse or suggest, express approval or support
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent] RECOMMEND NP2 NP1[agent] RECOMMEND COMP NP1[agent] RECOMMEND PP
sense.examples: I can recommend the chicken in mushroom sauce - it's delicious. She has been recommended for promotion. We will recommend your proposal to the school authorities. The doctor recommended (that) I take more exercise. I recommend writing your feelings down on paper. They recommended against signing international agreement.

sense.name: make attractive, appealing or worthy
sense.examples: The city has much to recommend it. Honesty recommends anyone. Since the legislation has little to recommend it, it is unlikely to pass.

sense.name: entrust someone to the care of another
sense.examples: She was recommended to our care until her family returned.
